# City Council

## Meetings

- 6:00 pm
- Second and fourth Tuesday of each month
- 242 Highway 30 E., Kimberly, ID 83341

## Agendas &amp; Minutes

Agendas are available prior to the meetings. 

**[View Agendas &amp; Minutes 2019- Present](https://www.cityofkimberly.org/AgendaCenter/City-Council-Meeting-Agenda-3).**  Select the time period and click on the magnify-glass

**Members**

- [Burke Davidson](https://www.cityofkimberly.org/directory.aspx?EID=75), Mayor  
  **Term Expires:** January 2028
- Stephanie Snarr  
  **Term Expires:** January 2028

## Description

Kimberly is governed by a Mayor and City Council who are elected by the people of the City. The Mayor and City Council acting together are the Governing Body. All Governing Body members serve four-year terms. The Governing Body, being the elected representative of the people, adopts all ordinances and resolutions and determines the general goals and policies.
